name: PewPew (itch) (gamesbyboon)
description:
MISSION:

Destroy enemies before they get to the bottom!

CONTROLS:

Four arrow keys to move.

Hold SPACE to shoot.

TIPS:

Your lives are shown in the bottom left corner.

Dodge bullets to avoid losing lives!

Colliding with enemies is also dangerous.

Look out for blinking green and yellow boxes - these are powerups!
